testtype: THROTTLEBRAKE  # THROTTLEBRAKE 、 ACCELERATION 、 STEER
# For THROTTLEBRAKE
enbale_inverse_gear: false
throttle_brake_cmd { aperture: 10.0 duration_time: 5.0 }
throttle_brake_cmd { aperture: 20.0 duration_time: 5.0 }
throttle_brake_cmd { aperture: -10.0 duration_time: 5.0 }

# For ACCELERATION
accel_acceleration_cmd: 1.0
brake_acceleration_cmd: -1.0

# For STEER
max_steer_percentage_cmd:
    10.0            # steer_cmd = max_steer_percentage_cmd*
                    #             sin(2*pi*sample_period_steer_cmd*t)
max_speed_cmd: 3.5  # keep vehicle speed = 5.0m/s
sample_period_steer_cmd: 5.0
pid_config {
  speed_kp: 8.0
  speed_ki: 10.0
  speed_kd: 0.0
  speed_integral_limit: 100.0
  aperture_min: -70.0
  aperture_max: 70.0
  aperture_rate_limit: 10.0
}
